title: SET_BLIP_SPRITE
content:
0xDF735600A4696DAF0x8DBBB0B9// SetBlipSprite
void SET_BLIP_SPRITE(Blip blip, int spriteId);Parameters:blip: The blip to change.spriteId: The sprite ID to set.Sets the displayed sprite for a specific blip.There's a list of sprites on the FiveM documentation site.Examples:LuaSetBlipSprite(blip, 588) -- changes `blip` to radar_nhp_orbit
codeBlocks:
// SetBlipSprite
void SET_BLIP_SPRITE(Blip blip, int spriteId);
